hooks.name: lint-on-edit
hooks.description: Run linter when files are edited
hooks.command: echo 'File edited: {{file_path}}' && if command -v eslint &> /dev/null; then eslint {{file_path}} || true; fi
hooks.comment: Enable this to run eslint automatically on file edits. Set enabled to true when ready.

hooks.name: test-on-commit
hooks.description: Remind to run tests before commits
hooks.command: echo 'Remember to run tests before committing!'
hooks.comment: Enable this to get reminders to run tests. Customize the command to actually run your test suite.

hooks.name: security-check
hooks.description: Run security checks on dependency changes
hooks.command: if [[ '{{file_path}}' == *'package.json'* ]] || [[ '{{file_path}}' == *'requirements.txt'* ]]; then echo 'Dependency file changed. Consider running security audit.'; fi
hooks.comment: Enable this to get reminders when dependency files change.
